channel.title: Need help ASAP
channel.description:
For some reason almost none of my commands are working,my dummies,portal(used global objects), and hay bales aint working. My teles in the magic tab arent even working.
NOTE: My server does not have any errors[br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2007, 02:07:14 AM[/size][hr]This is what in runserver when i click on the portal
[code]SpaceScape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player vorro1 ClientHandler: Client vorro1 disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:59147 Client type: low memory version UserId: 97265873 vorro1 is signing onto server. LOADED: 0 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 27 at client.addSkillXP(client.java:12003) at client.objectClick(client.java:612) at client.DoAction(client.java:511) at client.process(client.java:14810) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47)[/code]

item.title: Need help ASAP
item.dc:creator: @boomer216 boomer216
item.description:
@boomer216 wrote:

I know, its sad, but I know why. It isn’t your commands. By any chance did you add, hm, that PK Skill? If you did, you can’t use any playerLevel > 24 or else it throws an exception? Why? I will make a tutorial right now…

item.title: Need help ASAP
item.dc:creator: @mrtn4 mrtn4
item.description:
@mrtn4 wrote:

I’m no pro in Java, but I think your error is from incomplete coding.
I think the compiler had no errors because you typed it right.
Heres an example:
Working:

if (command.startsWith("male")) { sendMessage("You're now a man..."); pHead=1; pBeard=10; pTorso=18; pArms=26; pHands=33; pLegs=36; pFeet=42; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
Broken:

if (command.startsWith("male")) { sendMessage("You're now a man..."); pHead=1; pBeard=10; pTorso=18; pArms=-23333333333333333333333333336; //BROKEN HERE pHands=31233; pLegs=36; pFeet=42; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
